description:
The Petro Canada Bicentennial Bike trail connects the Parks Canada Rocky Moutain House National Historic Site with the town of Rocky Mountain House.
You can easily ride from the museum in Rocky Mountain house to the Historic site west of town off Highway 11A
directions:
Trail begins at parking lot to Rocky Mountain House historic site off highway 11a just west of the town.
In the other direction there is a trail head marker before (heading west) the bridge over the North Saskatchewan river.
GPS data attached goes from the museum to the historic site.
title: Petro Canada Bicentennial Trail
